Author: beautifulchaos22
Text: Thanks for the reply! I’m so sorry you had to deal with that! I 100% can relate to the wanting to restrict more! Ugh.   It’s so hard.

Author: Recoveryviacoffee
Text: I know how you feel, I bluntly got told I'd "have to deal with this on [my] own" at a BMI of maybe 22 or so? Having come from 35 in 6 months or so, iirc.   As I just put on that post, the inpatient unit that is being looked at for me can accept people as low as a BMI of 10, I'm at 14.5. Thus, I feel (of course) that I'm not "sick enough" and is driving me to restrict even more. 100-250 kcal a day, when at least before I was on 400..   Plus, there's a waiting list and we know that there's around 4-5 women waiting, and the beds are prioritised based on BMI - compared to a BMI of 10, I'm a fucking whale!?
